name: The icy morningstar called 'Frostwhisper' (2h)
data: It decreases hit chance a bit.
It has superb weapon class for its type (superb in general).
It does cold damage like a god.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
This is the weapon which belonged to the General
Rhad'ama'ntep, commander of the Third Legion of Dawn.
